flavorText: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

foreignData.flavorText: Ihre Prophezeiungen erstaunen sie noch, während sie sie verkündet.
foreignData.name: Omenverheißerin
foreignData.text: Wenn die Omenverheißerin ins Spiel kommt, wende Hellsicht 2 an. (Schaue dir die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst eine beliebige Anzahl davon unter deine Bibliothek legen und den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge oben darauf.)

foreignData.flavorText: Sus profecías la asombran a medida que las enuncia.
foreignData.name: Presagiadora
foreignData.text: Cuando la Presagiadora entre al campo de batalla, adivina 2. (Mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca, luego pon cualquier número de ellas en el fondo de tu biblioteca y el resto en la parte superior en cualquier orden.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ses prophéties l'ébahissent au moment même où elle les énonce.
foreignData.name: Sibylle
foreignData.text: Quand la Sibylle arrive sur le champ de bataille, regard 2. (Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles au-dessous de votre bibliothèque et le reste, au-dessus, dans n'importe quel ordre.)

foreignData.flavorText: Le sue profezie la sorprendono nell'istante in cui le pronuncia.
foreignData.name: Sibilla
foreignData.text: Quando la Sibilla entra nel campo di battaglia, profetizza 2. (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio, poi mettine un qualsiasi numero in fondo al tuo grimorio e le altre in cima in qualsiasi ordine.)

foreignData.flavorText: 彼女が発する予言の内容は、彼女自身さえも驚かせる。
foreignData.name: 前兆語り
foreignData.text: 前兆語りが戦場に出たとき、占術２を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見て、そのうちの望む枚数のカードを望む順番であなたのライブラリーの一番下に置き、残りを望む順番で一番上に置く。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: 그녀도 자신의 입에서 나오는 예언을 듣고 놀랐다.
foreignData.name: 흉조의 예언자
foreignData.text: 흉조의 예언자가 전장에 들어올 때, 점술 2를 한다. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드들 중 원하는 만큼을 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓고 나머지를 당신의 서고 맨 위에 원하는 순서대로 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Suas profecias a assombram mesmo enquanto ela as profere.
foreignData.name: Sibila
foreignData.text: Quando Sibila entrar no campo de batalha, use vidência 2. (Olhe os dois cards do topo do seu grimório. Depois, coloque qualquer número deles no fundo do seu grimório e o restante no topo em qualquer ordem.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ее пророчества изумляют ее саму даже тогда, когда она их произносит.
foreignData.name: Вещунья
foreignData.text: Когда Вещунья выходит на поле битвы, предскажите 2. (Посмотрите две верхние карты вашей библиотеки, затем положите любое количество из них в низ вашей библиотеки, а остальные на верх вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.)

foreignData.flavorText: 当她说出那些预言时连自己也大吃一惊。
foreignData.name: 示兆先知
foreignData.text: 当示兆先知进战场时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

foreignData.flavorText: 當她說出那些預言時連自己也大吃一驚。
foreignData.name: 示兆先知
foreignData.text: 當示兆先知進戰場時，占卜2。（檢視你牌庫頂的兩張牌，然後將其中任意數量的牌以任意順序置於你牌庫底，其餘則以任意順序置於你牌庫頂。）

name: Omenspeaker
originalText: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

rulings.text: When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you’ll scry last. For others, that means you’ll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability’s targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t scry.

text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
